about_the_game:
The Super Time Force Ultra Original Soundtrack by 6955 features more than 50 crazy chiptune tracks created exclusively for the game.

High quality MP3-format files will be placed in your Super Time Force Ultra folder in the Steam Directory: \steamapps\common\SuperTimeForceUltra\Soundtrack
detailed_description:
